metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious File Download From File Sharing Domain Via PowerShell.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious file downloads from file sharing domains using PowerShell.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('anonfiles.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cdn.discordapp.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ddns.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dl.dropboxusercontent.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ghostbin.co')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('glitch.me')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gofile.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mediafire.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mega.nz')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('onrender.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pages.dev')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('paste.ee')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastebin.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastebin.pl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pastetext.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pixeldrain.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('privatlab.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('privatlab.net')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('send.exploit.in')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sendspace.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('storage.googleapis.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('storjshare.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('supabase.co')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('temp.sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('transfer.sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('trycloudflare.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ufile.io')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('w3spaces.com')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('workers.dev'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.downloadstring(')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.downloadfile(')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-webrequest ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iwr ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wget '))))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious file downloads from file sharing domains using PowerShell.exe
